attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the rules so that the Premium Bond GBP1m monthly prize is abolished in favour of increasing the number of monthly Premium Bond GBP100,000.00p prizes to 15.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing the number of large prize winners in this way will increase the 'feel good' factor of premium bond wins exponentially.  There was NEVER any public consultation (the public, after all, are the owners of the money in the fund) over changing the payouts when it was arbitrarily decided to introduce a GBP1m monthly prize.  It is not good.
